name: capgemini-uk-msft-owaspscan-extensions
description: Runs security scan on API using OWASP zap and publish result to pipeline
author: capgemini-msft-uk

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment. This is used to create the OWASP ZAP container instance

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Name of the resource group.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the resource group that contains the storage account. The OWASP containers will also be created in this group.

inputs.name: VNet
inputs.label: Virtual Network
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Virtual Network in which to deploy the container instance to.

inputs.name: Subnet
inputs.label: Virtual Network
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Subnet in which to deploy the container instance to.

inputs.name: StorageAccountName
inputs.label: Name of the storage account
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Storage Account to be used by the OWASP container to store the results of the OWASP Scan.

inputs.name: ShareName
inputs.label: Name of the File Share
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the file share in the Storage Account where results of the OWASP Scan will be stored.

inputs.name: ImageName
inputs.label: Name of the OWASP Image
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the file share in the Storage Account where results of the OWASP Scan will be stored.

inputs.name: OptionFilePath
inputs.label: Path to Option file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to option file which will be use to prepare request headers require for the api scan.

outputVariables.name: XmlReportNameOutput
outputVariables.description: The name of the XML file outputted by the OWASP ZAP scan.

outputVariables.name: OwaspZapReportPathOutput
outputVariables.description: The full path to the OWASP ZAP XML report.
